Headline: Disprz is an AI-powered, mobile upskilling and reskilling suite, helping enterprises unlock business potential by enabling organization-wide skilling, while personalizing learning for the individual.

Highlights.name: Upskill and Reskill to address talent gaps
Highlights.description: Drive skill development by using role-specific insights on individual skills and career opportunities.  Guide employees towards meaningful learning opportunities, propelling their professional development within everyday work.

Highlights.name: Quantify skills to drive results
Highlights.description: Assess skills for job readiness, benchmarking for industry and functional alignment. Adapt skills to fit with company culture and market needs. Bridge skill gaps with role-specific content.

Highlights.name: Increase competitive market advantage
Highlights.description: Give employees the opportunity to upskill and reskill with role-based and interest-based skill development, ultimately attracting and retaining the best talent.

Highlights.name: Analytics tied to current or future talent gaps & business outcomes
Highlights.description: Enhance retention by delivering bursts of bite-sized microlearning content at the right time and on mobile for their convenience.

enhanced_description: Disprz is an AI-powered, mobile upskilling and reskilling suite designed to identify and benchmark employee skills for various job roles, assess current proficiency, and create hyper-personalized learning pathways to bridge skill gaps. It drives learning adoption through impactful content delivery, including bite-sized microlearning, and provides insightful analytics that link skilling directly to business performance. The platform facilitates skill-based personalized learning via a Learning Experience Platform (LXP) and offers scalable training and enablement for frontline workers through a feature-rich Enterprise LMS. Disprz ultimately helps global enterprises accelerate skill development, improve talent retention, increase competitive market advantage, and unlock business potential by enabling organization-wide skilling while personalizing learning for the individual.
